original_text: After this I looked again. I saw that God's house in heaven was open. That house is like God's tent, where he lived among his people in the wilderness.
korean_text: 또 이 일 후에 내가 보니 하늘에 증거 장막의 성전이 열리며

sentences.original_text: I saw that God's house in heaven was open.
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘에 있는 하나님의 집이 열려 있는 것을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: That house is like God's tent.
where he lived among his people in the wilderness.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 광야에서 그의 백성들과 함께 살았던 곳입니다.
